title: 「出黎啦」狗賊橫行 人人出黎游行～

replies.msg:
推

順便集思廣益改埋首歌啦

仲有

Admin E Share//

澳洲港人發起
【全球賣電視廣告反送中抗警暴】

面對全港怒吼，林鄭及北京都不肯回應五大訴求，那麽就發起全球港人發聲吧！在各海外港人居住當地，賣電視廣告，聚集更多港人及當地支持香港的朋友，一齊撐香港，對抗暴政。

我謹代發起人團隊，呼籲大家支持此項眾籌，讓反送中運動全球遍地開花。

An Australia Hong Konger is keen to provoke a stronger awareness about HK's Democratic Movement.

In order to do so, a group of HK people in Australia are producing a video with a professional standard that could be put on TV globally.

The Concept of the commercial has an international perspective, and is very creative and moving. Please check it out and support this project if believe that it is a worthy cause:

https://www.facebook.com/donate/353393255586568/?fundraiser_source=external_url
